meta.name: Life Fresh
meta.description: 清新生活风格，薄荷绿配色，适合旅行攻略、生活方式

base.container: background-color: #f0f9f4; color: #2d5a3d; font-family: 'PingFang SC', 'Hiragino Sans GB', sans-serif; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.85; padding: 24px;

headings.h2: color: #065f46; font-size: 22px; font-weight: 600; margin: 28px 0 16px; padding-bottom: 8px; border-bottom: 3px solid #10b981;
headings.h3: color: #10b981; font-size: 17px; font-weight: 600; margin: 20px 0 12px; display: inline-block; padding: 4px 12px; background-color: #d1fae5; border-radius: 20px;
headings.h1: color: #065f46; font-size: 22px; font-weight: 600; margin: 28px 0 16px; padding-bottom: 8px; border-bottom: 3px solid #10b981;
headings.h4: font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 8px; color: #57606a; margin-top: 20px;

text.code_inline: background-color: #d1fae5; color: #065f46; padding: 3px 8px; border-radius: 4px; font-family: monospace;

blocks.code_block: background-color: #ecfdf5; color: #065f46; padding: 16px; border-radius: 12px; margin: 16px 0; border: 1px solid #10b981;
blocks.quote_tip: background-color: #ecfdf5; border-left: 4px solid #10b981; color: #065f46; padding: 14px 18px; margin: 16px 0; border-radius: 0 8px 8px 0;
blocks.quote_warning: background-color: #fef2f2; border-left: 4px solid #f87171; color: #991b1b; padding: 14px 18px; margin: 16px 0; border-radius: 0 8px 8px 0;
blocks.hr: border: 0; height: 2px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, #10b981, transparent); margin: 32px 0;
blocks.quote_note: background-color: #e8f4fd; border-left: 4px solid #0969da; color: #0c3d6a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_info: background-color: #def7ff; border-left: 4px solid #58a6ff; color: #0c447a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_default: background-color: #f6f8fa; border-left: 4px solid #57606a; color: #57606a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.details: background-color: #f6f8fa; border: 1px solid #d0d7de; border-radius: 6px; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px;
blocks.summary: font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; color: #0969da; margin-bottom: 8px;

media.image_placeholder: background-color: #ecfdf5; border: 2px dashed #10b981; color: #10b981; padding: 24px; text-align: center; margin: 20px 0; border-radius: 12px;
media.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; margin: 15px 0; border-radius: 4px;

footer.style: margin-top: 40px; padding: 20px; background-color: #ecfdf5; border-radius: 12px; text-align: center; border: 1px solid #10b981;

math.inline: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-style: italic;
math.block: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 15px; border-radius: 6px; text-align: center; margin: 15px 0; overflow-x: auto; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;
